import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Ideck } from 'src/app/interfaces/Ideck'; @Component({ selector: 'app-deckdetails', templateUrl: './deckdetails.component.html', styleUrls: ['./deckdetails.component.scss'] }) export class DeckDetailsComponent implements OnInit { public deck: Ideck = { id: 0, cards: [], name: '', userEmail: '' }; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} }
